text: I’ve been swimming here almost every weekend, and the pool is generally clean and clear. I also appreciate that the water isn’t too cold, which is great since I can’t stand the cold. The pool is usually not too crowded as well especially during 3-5pm. Overall, it’s a good pool for doing laps. However, I’m not a fan of the mini pool beside the slides, it tends to be quite dirty.

Nice and clean pool facilities. It seems like one of the newer/improved pool complexes around. With the booking system in place, the pool was not crowded, with around 3-4 people using 2 laps.

The kids’ water play area looks fun - like a normal playground but over water. Do note that each kid above 1 year old needs to have an ActiveSG account and they need to have a slot booked together with adults to enter.

Thus is one of the many public pool in Singapore. It consists of one standard 50m main pool and a water feature play pool for kids.
It is crowded most of the time as it is used the members of the public and also swim school conducting swimming classes.
The toilet have been renovated and it comes with rain shower.
Normal operating hours have resumed as of June 2022
The pool is closed whole day on Wednesday for maintenance.
The kids play pool is under maintenance ( SEP 2023)

You can’t bring your board into kids pool. Then u can’t use extra floater into normal pool. The fark you mean? You expect people to have their own condo pool? No wonder there’s less human beings visiting your pool.

- S$1.7 for adult on weekends
- Changing area is quite clean, but not big, bathroom is spacious
- There are 2 pools: competition and kid.
